name: Sewer Guardian
description:
This is a pixelplatformer in development.

You play a Sewer Guardian. As such you have to find the lost keys to unlock the elevtors of the forgotten sewers.

 By doing so you make the sewers maintain-able again.

Look for checkpoints.

And don´t miss your goal.

Controls:

How to install:

1.  download  the ZIP-file

2. Extrat the data

3. Run the exe and have fun
